biotools.summary: Parallel KVFinder (parKVFinder) is an open-source software designed for the detection and spatial characterization (shape, volume, area and surrounding residues) of any type of biomolecular cavity. parKVFinder is available alongside an easy-to-use PyMOL plugin (PyMOL2 parKVFinder Tools) with an intuitive graphical user interface that allows users to explore customizable parameters for cavity detection and characterization.

bioschemas.name: parKVFinder
